summary.en: Central Finland, Jämsä; 65 km south-west of Jyväskylä; Villa Ristivehmas is renovated house in 2005, suitable for accommodations and meetings. Separate 80 m2 sauna building was completed in 2006. The main building has accommodation for 10 people, and even a larger space for group meetings for 20 persons. Jämsänkoski town services 9 km.
